title: Beth's Farm
overview: Beth’s Farm a single by Jerskin Fendrix from his album Once Upon A Time… In Shropshire, combines experimental pop with nostalgic themes. The music video, directed by Yorgos Lanthimos and featuring Emma Stone, accompanies the song.
